name: flight505-plugins
description: Official marketplace for flight505's Claude Code plugins - SDK Bridge, TaskPlex, Storybook Assistant, Project Planner, and Nano Banana

plugins.name: sdk-bridge
plugins.description: Interactive autonomous development assistant - generates PRDs, converts to execution format, and runs fresh Claude instances until complete. Based on Ralph pattern.

plugins.name: storybook-assistant
plugins.description: SOTA 2026 Storybook assistant with Vision AI design-to-code, natural language generation, AI-powered accessibility remediation, React Server Components, dark mode generation, and comprehensive testing

plugins.name: claude-project-planner
plugins.description: Production-ready project planning with progress tracking, error recovery, and comprehensive research - generates architecture docs, sprint plans, cost analyses, and implementation roadmaps

plugins.name: nano-banana
plugins.description: AI-powered image and diagram generation using state-of-the-art models via OpenRouter with quality review and iteration

plugins.name: taskplex
plugins.description: Resilient autonomous development with Smart Scaffold intelligence: 1-shot decision calls, SubagentStart/Stop hooks, SQLite knowledge store, inline validation with agent self-healing, and model routing
